attributes.action: Allow retired British expatriates the right to use the National Health Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are thousands of retired British expatriates living in the European Union who have paid National Insurance contributions all their working lives and yet are denied the right to use the National Health Service. This is unjust. As residents of the European Union they should be entitled to National Health care in the same way as they would be if they were resident in the United Kingdom.
